## EMPLOYMENT HISTORY

### Software Engineer at [Hi-Mídia - Grupo RBS] [himidia] (February 2011 - Present)
I´ve been working as software engineer, backend and frontend developer and using [SCRUM] [scrum] as work methodology.

##### System to manage clients and products
Working as software engineer, backend and frontend developer in 5 member team.
